'''''A Perfect Yesterday''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must read the interactable ''Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering'' inside the [[Materials Office]]'s locked room, which is unlocked during Step 7 of the {{Quest|Fontaine Research Institute, Stagnating in the Rubble}}.
